( #{item.commentId}, #{userId}, #{item.itemId}, #{item.itemName}, #{item.itemSpecId}, #{item.itemSpecName}, #{item.commentLevel}, #{item.content}, now(), now() )

SELECT ic.id AS commentId, ic.content AS content, ic.created_time AS createdTime, ic.item_id AS itemId, ic.item_name AS itemName, ic.sepc_name AS sepcName, ii.url AS itemImg FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON ic.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE ic.user_id = #{paramsMap.userId} AND ii.is_main = 1 ORDER BY ic.created_time DESC
